title: Aprende y Aplica Community
subtitle: Connect with other students, share knowledge and participate in discussions about artificial intelligence and educational technology

errors.loadErrorMessage: An error occurred while trying to load communities

rules.title: Community Rules
rules.subtitle: Help us maintain a respectful and constructive environment

respectful.title: Be Respectful
respectful.description: Treat all members with respect and courtesy. We do not tolerate harassment or discrimination.

shareKnowledge.title: Share Knowledge
shareKnowledge.description: Contribute useful and constructive information. Help others learn and grow.

privacy.title: Maintain Privacy
privacy.description: Do not share personal information of other members without their consent.

report.title: Report Issues
report.description: If you see inappropriate content, report it immediately to moderators.

activeModeration.title: Active moderation
activeModeration.description: A dedicated team maintains healthy and focused conversations.

constantCollaboration.title: Constant collaboration
constantCollaboration.description: Share ideas, questions and resources with like-minded professionals.

details.creator: Creator
details.noAdditionalAdmins: No additional administrators have been assigned yet.
details.beFirst: Be the first to join this community.
